message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this exceptional product. Given its value and potential, I believe a starting price of $950,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the $950,000 price point. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $820,000. This amount reflects my assessment of the product's worth and my financial capacity. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position, but $820,000 is significantly below my bottom line.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $900,000. This offer reflects the true value of the product.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the reduction, I must respectfully decline at this time. My budgetary constraints still do not allow me to meet the $900,000 price point. I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $850,000. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects both the value of the product and my financial situation. I hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
